name: Kiterocket
description:
The imaginative minds of Impress Labs and Duo Public Relations have combined to become Kiterocket, a PR and marketing agency that makes brands more valuable by embracing what makes them different, helping them find their voice and be heard.
We are communication strategists, publicists, designers, writers, developers, editors, journalists, social media consultants, event planners and inquisitive thinkers. We are technophiles, world travelers, environmentalists, scientists and fitness junkies.
READ MORE...
